headline.main: DR. DODDS DEMANDS FULL AID TO BRITAIN; Says at Princeton Opening We Must Turn Full Power Against Axis Forces SCORES PASSIVE DEFENSE Asserts Clear-Cut Action is Needed if Our Human Values Are to Remain With Us

lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N.J., Sept. 21 -- Dr. Harold W. Dodds, president of Princeton University, in an address at the official opening of the university this afternoon, called on American citizens to relinquish all ideas of passive defense and turn the full strength of national power against the Axis forces.
abstract: aid to Brit urged by Dr H W Dodds
